verses.roman:
ei-mata sei rātri tāhāṅi rahilā
prātaḥ-kāle prabhu snāna kariyā calilā

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; sei rātri—that night; tāhāṅi—there; rahilā—stayed; prātaḥ-kāle—in the morning; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; snāna—bath; kariyā—taking; calilā—again started.
translation: Thus Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu would remain at night in one place and the next morning, after bathing, start again.
